msbt.message: Hey, ! You gotta help us! here is trying to figure out an ideal outfit for .
Yeah, it needs to be aerodynamic and wicking, but also completely over-the-top visually. I want to rock faces with my skills.

This is a bit outside my normal fashion expertisebut I'm thinking that for aerodynamics, less is more. You might have heard of "short shorts." Well, what I'd recommend here would be "even shorter shorts."
Show off the legs, huh?Well, that might work, but I don't want my epic quads to distract from my epic skills
Go with the shorts.
Nah, something else.
You really think so?<10_4 /> <20_2 arg="5" />Well, in that case, I'd better get to work shortening my shorts.
Maybe we shouldn't have encouraged him
See? I want my muscles to complement my performance, not steal the show. Back to the drawing board for , I guess.But I like the short shorts idea for my upcoming leg day exhibition, Quadzilla Fest !
I could have lived my whole life not knowing that Quadzilla Fest existed.
Oh, hey, ! Me and were just talking about island style. You knowlike, what's the best kind of stuff to wear in a place like this?
Yeah, but remember—it has to be functional.If I can't lunge to full extension— and I mean FULL extension—at a moment's notice, it's no use to me.
If you need to be constantly lunging, maybe you should consider wearing tights. Plus, they're super comfy!
Tights, huh? Do they even make casual tights for men with extremely athletic thighs? <20_2 arg="8" />Well, what do you think, ?
That's a great idea!
No. Just no.
Yeah? I guess I never considered that I could wear tights outside of the gym <20_2 arg="5" />But why not, right? Plus, in tights, I could always be ready if anyone challenged me to a burpee contest.
I don't know what this has to do with a burping contest, but I'm excited for you, buddy.
Yeah, you're right. The world's not ready to see me in tights.<20_2 arg="5" />Especially after today's workout. Squat 'em if you got 'em!
I don't know much about working out, but count me in!
Really. Six thousand crunches in one minute?
Well, I did the math.The Abdominal Distender claims to offer the same workout as doing 100 crunches per second!
Wowwww. It's amazing what you can get on the internet these days.
And what if I did actual crunches while wearing it? It's like, crunches on crunches! Bet they didn't account for someone doing that!
You're definitely going to be ripped and shredded.
Hey, you seem more pumped than usual, . What's going on, ?
Oh, I'm just incredibly sore from the workout I just did. It's the best!But what was that thing you just said?
What, ?<10_4 /> It's just a thing I say every now and then. Part of the brand!
Well, uhdo you think I could try it out?<10_4 /> Bah, no time to wait for an answer! One, Two, Three.That is sweet! What a great way to bang out reps!
Hey, anything to pump up my exposure. No such thing as bad publicity, right? Just try not to sweat on me while you're doing it
